cab.content: $3- C RET.MBATTLE SITUATION - NOOK - 5th NOVRkBlSR, 1918.WESTERN FROM.Flanders Front,.In Flanders the line runs, northern outskirts of GHENT,alon,^ the west bank of the USRHEUZSN CANAL to the DufcchFrontier.British Front.Further progress has been made in the Forest of MORMALthe greater part of which is now in our hands.French Front.The line reached by the Fourth French Army and FirstAmerican Army is as follows :- ARDilhib^j CANAL fromto Li^S PliiTITaS ^RiiOISSS, southern outskirts of B.lJ.,TJM0NT,south of ST3H&Y,ITALIAN FRONT.There is nothing to report.Balkan front.In ALBANIA tho Italians have occupied SCUTARI.General Staff,War Office, S.W.1.5th November. 1918.Issued at 1235, %\
